component.name: ThemedLabelList
component.script:
Sub Init()
m.top.showFocusFootprint = true m.global.observeFieldScoped("theme", "OnThemeChanged")
End Sub
Sub OnThemeChanged()
m.top.focusBitmapBlendColor = m.global.theme.primary 'm.top.focusFootprintBlendColor = "0x3C3C3CFF" m.top.focusedColor = m.global.theme.textOnPrimary
End Sub
